00151 float* O_label::get_extras(float* dataout)
00152 {
00153         int i = 0;
00154         list<float>::iterator fit;
00155         if (dataout == NULL)
00156                 dataout = (float*)malloc(extras.size()*sizeof(float));
00157         for (fit = extras.begin(); fit != extras.end(); fit++)
00158                 dataout[i++]=*fit;
00160         return dataout;
00161 }

00332 O_spectral::O_spectral(int pitchin, list<float> & coeffin, int statenbin, int bufferefin, int durationin, int phrasein, int sectionin) : O_label(statenbin, bufferefin, durationin, phrasein, sectionin)
00333 {
00334         pitch = pitchin;
00335         if (!coeffin.empty())
00336         {
00337                 energy = coeffin.front();
00338                 coeffs = coeffin;
00339         }
00340 }

00380 float* O_spectral::get_coeffs(float* dataout)
00381 {
00382         int i = 0;
00383         list<float>::iterator fit;
00384         if (dataout == NULL && coeffs.size()!=0)
00385                 dataout = (float*)malloc(coeffs.size()*sizeof(float));
00386         for (fit = coeffs.begin(); fit != coeffs.end(); fit++)
00387                 dataout[i++]=*fit;
00389         return dataout;
00390 }

00393 {
00394         if(!coeffin.empty())
00395         {
00396                 energy = coeffin.front();
00397                 coeffs = coeffin;
00398         }
00399 }

00408 void O_spectral::print(ostream & out) const
00409 {
00410     out<<"{"<<endl;
00412     O_label::print(out);
00413     out<<","<<endl;
00414     
00415         out<<"    \"pitch\" : "<<this->pitch<<", "<<endl;
00416     out<<"    \"coeffs\" : [ ";
00417         list<float>::const_iterator it;
00418         for (it = this->coeffs.begin(); it!= this->coeffs.end(); it++)
00419     {
00420         if (it!=this->coeffs.begin())
00421             out<<", ";
00422                 out<<showpoint<<(*it);
00423     }
00424     out<<" ]"<<endl;
00425     out<<"}";
00426 }

00517 int* O_MIDI_note::get_note(int* noteout)
00518 {
00519         if (noteout == NULL)
00520                 noteout = (int*)malloc(5*sizeof(int));
00521         noteout[0]=pitch;
00522         noteout[1]=velocity;
00523         noteout[2]=channel;
00524         noteout[3]=offset;
00525         noteout[4]=duration;
00527         return noteout;
00528 }

00585 // Set & Get
00586 
00587 list<O_MIDI_note> O_MIDI::get_notes()
00588 {
00589         return notes;
00590 }
00591 
00592 int* O_MIDI::get_notes(int* notesout)
00593 {
00594         int i;
00595         i = notes.size();
00596         if (notesout == NULL)
00597                 notesout = (int*)malloc(i*4*sizeof(int));
00598         i = 0;
00599         list<O_MIDI_note>::iterator noteit;
00600         for (noteit = notes.begin(); noteit!= notes.end(); noteit++)
00601         {
00602                 notesout[i] = noteit->pitch;
00603                 notesout[i+1] = noteit->velocity;
00604                 notesout[i+2] = noteit->channel;
00605                 notesout[i+3] = noteit->offset;
00606                 i+=4;
00607         }
00608         return notesout;
00609 }
00610 
00611 void O_MIDI::set_notes(list<O_MIDI_note> notesin)
00612 {
00613         notes = notesin;
00614 }
00615 
00616 void O_MIDI::set_notes(O_MIDI_note* note1,...)
00617 {
00618         va_list notelist;
00619         va_start(notelist,note1);
00620         O_MIDI_note* noteptr = note1;
00621         while (noteptr!= NULL)
00622         {
00623                 notes.push_back(*noteptr);
00624                 noteptr = va_arg(notelist,O_MIDI_note*);
00625         }
00626         va_end(notelist);
00627         notes.sort();
00628 }
00629 
00630 list<int> O_MIDI::get_pitches() const
00631 {
00632         list<int> pitches;
00633         list<O_MIDI_note>::const_iterator noteit;
00634         for (noteit = notes.begin(); noteit!= notes.end(); noteit++)
00635                 pitches.push_back(noteit->pitch);
00636         pitches.unique();
00637         return pitches;
00638 }

00660 void O_MIDI::print(ostream & out) const
00661 {
00662     out<<"{"<<endl;
00664     O_label::print(out);
00665     out<<","<<endl;
00666     
00667     out<<"    \"slice\" : [ "<<this->vpitch<<", "<<this->mvelocity<<" ],"<<endl;
00668     out<<"    \"notes\" : ["<<endl;
00669         list<O_MIDI_note>::const_iterator noteit;
00670         for (noteit = this->notes.begin(); noteit!= this->notes.end(); noteit++)
00671     {
00672         if (noteit!=this->notes.begin())
00673             out<<", "<<endl;;
00674         out<<"    {"<<endl;
00675         noteit->print(out);
00676         out<<"    }";
00677     }
00678     out<<endl;
00679     out<<"              ]"<<endl;
00680     out<<"}";
00681 }
